item.title: FixMyStreet ref: 7651564., 10th September
item.description:
If your highways inspector believes this is not poor workmanship and does not need repairs, he is clearly in the wrong job, as are the contractors who carried out the works in the first place! The original inspector concluded the wrong concrete mix had been used and works clearly needed to be rectified, what's changed ??? Sort out repairs and stop fobbing people off. I am more than happy to meet with your "Highways Inspector" so he can explain how concrete that washes away in the rain is adequate when installing a crossover!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Highbanks Close, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trip hazard outside morrisons sidcup, 10th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Jenner Close, Longlands, London

item.title: Tree still blocking sign, 10th September
item.description:
Further to my report 8112494 on the 03/09/2025 your update on the 04/09/2025 stating the problem had been resolved. When I passed there today 10/09/2025 the problem was still there. If this is your view that it has been RESOLVED then IWOULD HATE TO SEE IT IF YOU HAD DONE NOTHING, WHICH YOU HAVE. UNLEEE YOU NEED A NEW PAIR OF GLASSES. GO AND HAVE ANOTHER LOOK. Had troble trying to loeasd photo, please send me your email address.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 74, Crayford Road, Crayford, Dartford
Report on FixMyStreet
